name: Elminage III: Ankoku no Shito to Taiyou no Kyuuden
name_original: Elminage III: Ankoku no Shito to Taiyou no Kyuuden
description:
The Sun Palace brings warmth and prosperity to people with its purifying light that expels darkness. However, at some point, the light faded, and it became clear that they were being invaded by the dark relatives. The Sun Palace is so high above the earth that even flying animals, let alone humans, cannot reach it.
In the face of an unprecedented crisis, the human king Balgert issued a broad warning: "Restore the legendary stairway of light that leads to the sky and recapture the Sun Palace. Those who achieve it will be rewarded as much as they wish."
And so the adventure began.
This is the 3rd series of the classic 3D dungeon RPG "Erminage" that emphasizes freedom and replayability. Players can freely choose characters from 12 races and 16 occupations to create their own party. In addition, you can use extra skills to extend your character's strengths and compensate for their weaknesses.
In the dungeons, you will encounter vicious and unique monsters, various traps, and unknown treasures.
